title: Illaoi pumpkin carving
body:
Not as successful as I had hoped; it doesn't really do justice to one of my favorite champs.

But, like Illaoi says: "LEARN!"

replies.body:
Noooo, are you kidding me?! This is freakin' awesome!! 

{{sticker:sg-lux}}
Hidden skinline confirmed?

A pumpkin themed skin for Illaoi makes a lot of sense now that you think about it.
Her idol could be a pumpkin, and her tentacles vines for said pumpkins.

Honestly this has potential and I'd love to see it in game as a harrowing skin if the Adventurer skin doesn't win the vote. (Because if it did we'd have two skins with vine tentacles, haha)
Great Pumpkin Illaoi?
Yesssssssssss
Goot LAWT that's insane! WE NEED MOAR.

A seven-foot bodybuilder chick who screams LEARN while waving around a giant stone head that SPROUTS GHOST TENTACLES.....isn't spoopy to you?

u wot m8? O_o
Sounds like one of my teachers back in school.
Wait what year was this
Hard to tell, we used to calculate time in moon phases.
It's made of metal, the idol she carries, if that makes it any more scary. And the tentacles are the tentacles of a god, so i mean. Yeah, she'd spook me.
Looks cool, props to the artist.
Awesome~{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Holy sh*t.

You are insane to have been able to make this.
T-That's... not p-p-possible... wtf.
WHAT THE ACTUAL FUCK{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
I made some cool marvel comic character pumpkins in the past, but the details on this trump them easy. Awesome work.
this is amazing! {{champion:420}} {{sticker:sg-kiko}}

That moment you realise how talentless of a hack you are when you see good artists' work.

Awesome job tho. Maybe add tentacle god's face on the other side, or GP's, whichever you prefer.
SO COOL
This is amazing
I know this is more like a sculpture but can we add this to the League Fan Art Showcase?
Dope skills!
That is a pretty darn swell job you did there.
holy shit , thats actually beautiful
Love this so much.
OOoo spooky
Ooh, maybe you can do her idol next year.
This is even better than my copy pasting of the original picture
https://goo.gl/forms/SM2z6sqYoc1N3NsK2 do my survey
